article.title: #原创新人#桌面上の“芯”改造，Leopold FC 900R十周年版入手简谈：
article.author: 狮子也是猫
article.contentHtml: [{"id":"84ee","type":0,"text":{"text":"小编注：双11买了不晒损失一半，#晒单大赛#活动火热来袭，剁过的手都开个箱吧！iPhoneX等好礼等你来赢，投稿即得额外100金币，还有原创新人独家奖励，App可光速投稿，详情戳这里。","markups":[{"tag":"a","start":88,"end":91,"source":"https://post.smzdm.com/p/617476/","width":0,"height":0}]}},{"id":"9208","type":0,"text":{"text":"最近搬家，之前用的键盘都不知道怎么就接触不良了。硬是USB辨别不出来.我要 ,我要~~百般无奈之下，只能在咸鱼里面看下有没有半价的键盘先收一个回来。要是能碰8、9成新的大F、大L呢 ￼ 翻了几页之后，看到有 8折LEOPOLD FC 900R.有木有!那时还将信将疑@了卖家,一来二去，同城的最后还是选择面交。一手交钱一手交货心理踏实一点￼","markups":[{"tag":"a","start":9,"end":11,"source":"https://www.smzdm.com/fenlei/jianpan/","width":0,"height":0},{"tag":"a","start":26,"end":29,"source":"https://www.smzdm.com/fenlei/usbjixianqi/","width":0,"height":0},{"tag":"img","start":91,"end":92,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/2415ff29ccc7acdb8ffc762a5d44cda1_33_30.png","width":33,"height":30},{"tag":"img","start":169,"end":170,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/cf578648e03a0dc106d36915fc931b15_43_31.png","width":43,"height":31}]}},{"id":"d224","type":0,"text":{"text":"￼Leopold FC900R 利奥博德 104 游戏机械键盘 红色/十周年限定版","markups":[{"tag":"img","start":0,"end":1,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/a6a4e79ed8e092332fe49c077ca0a109_200_200.jpeg","width":120,"height":120},{"tag":"a","start":1,"end":41,"source":"https://go.smzdm.com/202de641b927688c/ca_bb_yc_163_619444_10084_34485_183","width":0,"height":0}]}},{"id":"3539","type":0,"text":{"text":"889元","markups":[{"tag":"a","start":0,"end":4,"source":"https://go.smzdm.com/202de641b927688c/ca_bb_yc_163_619444_10084_34485_183","width":0,"height":0}]}},{"id":"da43","type":0,"text":{"text":"天猫精选去购买","markups":[{"tag":"a","start":0,"end":4,"source":"https://go.smzdm.com/202de641b927688c/ca_bb_yc_163_619444_10084_34485_183","width":0,"height":0},{"tag":"a","start":4,"end":7,"source":"https://go.smzdm.com/202de641b927688c/ca_bb_yc_163_619444_10084_34485_183","width":0,"height":0}]}},{"id":"91af","type":0,"text":{"text":"开箱："}},{"id":"2bcd","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/b525d3aea89fe3980073c81fd1602d40_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"cbc5","type":0,"text":{"text":"键盘的包装看起来有点老旧了，不过算是保存得还可以。黑色的包装底色用彩印的方式印下了键盘的特点，好在左上角的保修卡并没有什么刮痕，不然就呵呵了~"}},{"id":"c505","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/374d500fbe3c55435c5ef8aa12a6e4fc_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"59ff","type":0,"text":{"text":"背面左侧是键盘的一些性能特点，右侧是键盘轮廓和参数。感觉有点像PPT的模板。"}},{"id":"b6e9","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/af5324a54cb60b70722b8c09c34ab839_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"a219","type":0,"text":{"text":"打开包装盒，键盘被一个透明的防尘罩稳稳的盖着，上面一本白色的说明书，整体显得比较简洁。"}},{"id":"2ccb","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/53dd142b6354a6829257d77a58a38e46_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"1d60","type":0,"text":{"text":"配件方面，留下来的也着实不多，一本中文的说明书，一个PS转接口，一个透明防尘罩、一条黑色的数据线。本想着是不是还有一二个键帽的，然鹅￼","markups":[{"tag":"a","start":45,"end":48,"source":"https://www.smzdm.com/fenlei/shujuxian/","width":0,"height":0},{"tag":"a","start":60,"end":62,"source":"https://www.smzdm.com/fenlei/jianmao/","width":0,"height":0},{"tag":"img","start":66,"end":67,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/4e5471afa2ea0195ee45b6576ba9023b_52_33.png","width":52,"height":33}]}},{"id":"9680","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/af0568b357bfb207031bd386d1f3ca70_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"7dee","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/bca50eaf241e21daa7c83304a5c344a1_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"ac07","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/8ebbe87665102f70f7dd7ad00f2a4c65_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"2163","type":0,"text":{"text":"键盘104式的标准配列，灰蓝色的键帽，搭配黑色外壳，看起来有点复古的感觉。经过上一代主人的折腾，到手之后没有看到到太多的瑕疵，质量也算是可以。"}},{"id":"2c5f","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/b20ba5649c5a8a4bae9a0d44b9afa1e2_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"684e","type":0,"text":{"text":"侧面是简约的窄边框设计。晒纹的ABS外壳摸起来有点颗粒感。侧面看去，键帽排列规整。R1到R4的原厂高度方便更换键帽。"}},{"id":"eff0","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/5777a701872911242cbd2fd361616919_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"caec","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/d5e7a9ab9449a886852eddba64cbe244_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"c0e2","type":0,"text":{"text":"右上角有着简单的LOGO，显得比较稳重。侧翼还有个金属的小LOGO，估计也是上一次的玩家贴上去了。"}},{"id":"0cd4","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/2b9e9ec1acee050288fe434541217494_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"d98a","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/4307995dc14459be45758072ad22e717_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"8c48","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/7fec674c8617f6a9ceb4611e1ba010b0_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"b20d","type":0,"text":{"text":"背面还是保持着简单布局，底壳质感上颗粒感比外壳的要小一些。四块常规的黑色防滑脚垫防滑效果还不错。一段式的撑脚可以提升录入角度，经常码字的时候可以缓解下手部的疲劳感。看来有时间要再去入手个手托才行 ￼","markups":[{"tag":"img","start":98,"end":99,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/d319d350ba486654d457c491a9913448_33_30.png","width":33,"height":30}]}},{"id":"95d5","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/69ee6f551914448fd8fe7391d15671ff_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"cda1","type":0,"text":{"text":"三分线理线槽，方便桌面的整理，桌面日常有一些杂乱的数据线也是比较烦人的。好处是以后想换键盘就不用蹲到桌面下了，省事。"}},{"id":"63bd","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/03096157a5cac7055a175307e75836a8_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"1815","type":0,"text":{"text":"DIP调节是设置一些键位互换的功能。比较适合学代码的人折腾了。简单的码下字的确实用不了多少。全键无冲、多媒体设置、加速这些功能对照说明就可以了,此处省略一万字。￼","markups":[{"tag":"img","start":80,"end":81,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/54ef685552bf0eb0cb06923ebeee868b_53_35.png","width":53,"height":35}]}},{"id":"a842","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/4c11e10ca764f006c3bd40ff9f02e4c8_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"fd9d","type":0,"text":{"text":"黑色的橡胶数据线。软硬适中，带有绑带线，然而并没有镀金。"}},{"id":"199e","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/8dd03fb3bbb2624eb8dc97e2bbf3bd77_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"410c","type":0,"text":{"text":"键帽方面采用的是PBT加热升华。表面比较细腻，字符清晰。灰蓝相间的键帽给人一种复古的感觉。虽然经手了一次，不过键帽在耐损方面还是挺不错的，表面没有看到什么坑坑洼洼的情况出现。不过给我的感觉就是接触面积稍微有点小了￼ 看来要慢慢适应下。","markups":[{"tag":"img","start":106,"end":107,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/704c979631c33869881bd69ad8a7d3f1_33_30.png","width":33,"height":30}]}},{"id":"e369","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/e63f97bd28726e3b5fa9f3de971aba71_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"44ab","type":0,"text":{"text":"背面1.5mm的PBT内壁,做工比较扎实。"}},{"id":"3150","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/8dd03fb3bbb2624eb8dc97e2bbf3bd77_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"35af","type":0,"text":{"text":"轴提采用的是CHERRY 的MX红轴。本来是在由于着要买什么轴体的。面交的时候按起来比较手感不错，手感轻盈。不过对于青轴来说 ,太大的声音并不怎么适合我，毕竟住得的地方还是喜欢安静一点的。码字感觉不错，游戏也能兼顾。至于轴体上插入式的灯孔，有时间再DIY下~"}},{"id":"2813","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/fa439cf4d84cb74b3b716f9b2d658900_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"2ec3","type":0,"text":{"text":"大键位采用卫星轴，调教得比较顺畅， 没有出现松松垮垮的声音。"}},{"id":"d2da","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/555609c752da201e317e7666898119ff_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"c844","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/dae8326ff0ed683a921f5b5e3f267e66_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"0555","type":0,"text":{"text":"CapsLock/ScrollLock/NumLock作为键盘的灯光指示，采用的是双料注塑,淡淡的灯光作为点缀。"}},{"id":"fa5e","type":1,"image":{"width":600,"height":400,"source":"http://qiniuimg.qingmang.mobi/image/orion/93da97d0f0b5c905c3d0df75e9ac744f_600_400.jpeg","inline":false}},{"id":"7cc3","type":0,"text":{"text":"总结：键盘海军蓝的配色，简约的外观比较复古。红轴的输入手感不错，码字的时候按压力度不大，直上直下的感觉比较轻盈。偶尔玩下游戏也可以胜任。不过键盘的键帽与手指的接触面积有点小，所以还是得习惯下。键线分离设计方便日常桌面的打理，不过数据线没有镀金。键盘104配列，有了数字区方便录入，不过还是挺占空间的~"}},{"id":"182e","type":0,"text":{"text":"优点 1.海军蓝配色复古"}},{"id":"50ae","type":0,"text":{"text":"2.键盘手感流畅"}},{"id":"2c04","type":0,"text":{"text":"3.键线分离设计"}},{"id":"b327","type":0,"text":{"text":"缺点：1.键帽的与手指的接触面积有点小"}},{"id":"903c","type":0,"text":{"text":"2.键帽比较硬"}},{"id":"de09","type":0,"text":{"text":"3.数据线没有镀金"}}]
article.appTagline: 张大妈的独门网购秘技
